title: EnChroma's Schmeder on Bringing Color to the Colorblind (Audio)
itunes:title: EnChroma's Schmeder on Bringing Color to the Colorblind (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Andy Schmeder, CEO and Co-Founder of EnChroma, on their eyeglass technology that helps colorblind people see color.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
